results.overview: A student gets his senses enhanced by an experimental drug. But abuse is not an option.
results.title: Senseless

results.overview: Elliott Gast is quickly climbing the corporate ladder of international commerce, negotiating deals to generate large fortunes for giant corporations. His success makes him the target for political extremists who kidnap him and broadcast his imprisonment and mutilation over the internet as macabre reality show and fundraiser.
results.title: Senseless

results.overview: An isolated soldier holds his position and prisoner during the downfall of a Nuclear War.
results.title: Senseless

results.overview: In a fight for survival, a young woman must outwit two merciless and armed criminals when a grab-and-go car burglary turns into a deadly home invasion.
results.title: Senseless

results.overview: "Consisting of a poetic stream of razor-sharp images, the overt content of SENSELESS portrays ecstatic travelers going to pot over the fantasies and pleasures of a trip to Mexico... highly effective cutting subtly interweaves the contrapuntal developement of themes of love and hate, peace and violence, beauty and destruction."-- David Brooks.
results.title: Senseless

results.original_title: Thomas Sowell: Common Sense in a Senseless World
results.overview: Traces Thomas Sowell's journey from humble beginnings to the Hoover Institution, becoming one of our era's most controversial economists, political philosophers, and prolific authors.
results.title: Thomas Sowell: Common Sense in a Senseless World

results.original_title: Nick Di Paolo: Another Senseless Killing
results.overview: If you've never seen Nick Di Paolo live, this intimate setting captures the essence of what makes him stand out from other comics. "Another Senseless Killing" is 56 minutes of funny, ferocious, but always clever material. In Di Paolo's fifth special he skillfully mines the humor in such light hearted topics as Suicide and Roadside Memorials while also educating you on the finer points of A**hole Bleaching and the Evolution of Pornography.
results.title: Nick Di Paolo: Another Senseless Killing

results.overview: After the death of his partner, Jaime discovers that his Polaroids can transport him to special moments with her.
results.title: Sin Sentido

results.original_title: Walang-Saysay Na Pasyong Mura Ni Hesus Corazon Dyus Kong Sukat Ipanlamig Ng Puso Ng Sinumang Inibig!
results.overview: An unedited blur of random images from a day in a life of Jesus Corazon, the serial rapist-killer of Manila who collects women's hearts in glass jars. Mixed with snuff & other found footage. Accompanied by a non-sequitur deluge of distorted guitar, a synthetic piano orchestra, drum&bass, and abstract spokenword poetry.
results.title: The Profane And Senseless Passion Of Jesus Corazon Who, By The Disgrace Of God, Freezes The Heart Of The Loved One
